_header: This world is dealed all on three
_description: A geography in verse — in couplets

BLRoy13Di.First Lines:
Þis world ys delyd al on threAsie Affrike and
                    Europe…
BLRoy13Di.Last Lines:
…Cornwayle Irlond colriche & IselondBy the see syde of
                    Irlond
BLRoy13Di.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.271-3.

YaleBei593.First Lines:
This wordle is deled on threAsie Affrike and EuropeWole ye now
                    here of AsieHow fele landis þerynne be…
YaleBei593.Last Lines:
…Cornwaile Irelond colriche & IselondBy the syde of
                    Irelond
YaleBei593.Note:
Written two lines of verse per line of MS on f. 202v; rhyme
                    fails frequently.

Goldschmidt50.Note:
A verse geographical introduction to a prose Brut; Hamer (1995)
XHamer,  Richard. 
             A Manuscript Index to the Index of Middle English Verse.
         London: British Library, 1995 lists as unidentified, missing or destroyed.
